featured.text: Angelfish live in groups, and each group has one male fish, which is blue in color, and four female fish, which are yellow.
One particular kind of angelfish, the blackspot angelfish, has a special capability that allows it to change gender from female to male.
What is the job of an angelfish in the sea? (A) Being a cleaner for other fish.

other.text: Which of the following describes the order of changes in the features of a blackspot angelfish during gender change? (A) Size  behavior  color  stripes.
Which of the following statements is true about the color of angelfish? (A) Female angelfish are blue in color.
The male angelfish is the strongest and largest member of the group.
Another interesting fact about angelfish is that they have an occupation in the fish world.
According to the passage, what triggers the gender change in the blackspot angelfish? (A) Dangers to the group.

definition.zh_def: 一種色彩鮮豔的熱帶魚，通常生活在珊瑚礁中，屬於鯛科。
definition.en_def: A brightly colored tropical fish that typically inhabits coral reefs, belonging to the family Pomacanthidae.
definition.example: The angelfish swam gracefully among the coral, showcasing its vibrant colors.
